verbs.description: [ARG1: artichoke mushroom] [V: caps] these crumb - topped appetizers never last long at parties the rich filling of cream cheese artichoke hearts parmesan cheese and green onion is terrific you can broil them in your oven to enjoy any time of year —ruth lewis west newton pennsylvania
